metadata.titleEn: China regional atmospheric driving dataset based on geostationary satellites and reanalysis data (2005-2010)
metadata.titleCn: 基于静止卫星和再分析资料的中国区域大气驱动数据集（2005-2010）
metadata.description:
Based on the geostationary satellites and reanalysis data, the China Regional Atmospheric Driving Dataset is a set of atmospheric driving data sets with high spatiotemporal resolution prepared by the China Meteorological Administration, with a spatial resolution of 0.1 ° × 0.1 ° and a temporal resolution of 1 Hours, covering a range of 75 ° -135 ° east longitude and 15 ° -55 ° north latitude, include 6 elements of near-surface temperature, relative humidity, ground pressure, near-surface wind speed, incident solar radiation on the ground, and ground precipitation rate. The preparation process of precipitation products is as follows: The 6-hour cumulative precipitation estimated from the multi-channel data of the China Fengyun-2 geostationary satellite is integrated with the 6-hour cumulative precipitation from conventional ground observations to obtain 6-hour cumulative precipitation spatial distribution data, and then use the high-resolution cloud classification information retrieved from the multi-channel inversion of the geostationary satellites determines the interpolation time weight of the cumulative precipitation and obtains an estimated one-hour cumulative precipitation. The preparation process of the radiation data is as follows: The surface incident solar radiation based on FY-2C, uses the radiation transmission model DISORT (Discrete Ordinates Radiative Transfer Program for a Multi-Layered Plane-parallel Medium) to calculate the radiation transmission and obtains the data of surface incident solar radiation in China. Preparation process of other elements: The space and time interpolation method is used for the NCEP reanalysis data of 1.0 ° × 1.0 ° to obtain driving factors such as near-surface air temperature, relative humidity, ground pressure, and near-surface wind speed of 0.1 ° × 0.1 ° per hour.
Physical meaning of each variable:
Meteorological Elements || Variable Name || Unit || Physical Meaning
| Surface temperature || TBOT || K || Surface temperature (2m)
| Surface pressure || PSRF || Pa || Surface pressure
| Relative humidity on the ground || RH || kg / kg || Relative humidity near the ground (2m)
| Wind speed on the ground || WIND || m / s || Wind speed near the ground (anemometer height)
| Surface incident solar radiation || FSDS || W / m2 || Surface incident solar radiation
| Precipitation Rate || PRECTmms || mm / hr || Precipitation Rate
For more information, see the data documentation published with the data.
metadata.descriptionCn:
基于静止卫星和再分析资料的中国区域大气驱动数据集是由中国气象局制备的一套具有较高时空分辨率的大气驱动数据集，空间分辨率为0.1°×0.1°，时间分辨率为1小时，覆盖范围为东经75°-135°，北纬15°-55°，包含近地面气温、相对湿度、地面气压、近地面风速、地表入射太阳辐射和地面降水率6个要素。其中降水产品的制备过程如下：利用中国风云二号静止卫星多通道数据所反演的6小时累积降水估计与常规地面观测6小时累积降水进行数据融合，获得6小时累积降水空间分布数据，然后利用静止卫星多通道反演的高分辨率云分类信息确定累积降水时间插值权重，得到1小时累积降水估计。辐射资料的制备过程如下：基于FY-2C的地表入射太阳辐射采用辐射传输模型DISORT(Discrete Ordinates Radiative Transfer Program for a Multi-Layered Plane-parallel Medium)进行辐射传输计算，获得逐小时0.1°×0.1°的中国区域地表入射太阳辐射数据。其他要素的制备过程：对1.0°×1.0°的NCEP再分析资料采用空间和时间插值方法，获得逐小时0.1°×0.1°的近地面气温、相对湿度、地面气压、近地面风速等驱动要素。
各变量的物理意义：
气象要素 || 变量名 || 单位 || 物理意义 
| 地面气温 || TBOT || K || 近地面（2m）气温 
| 地表气压 || PSRF || Pa || 地表气压 
| 地面相对湿度 || RH || kg/ kg ||近地面(2m)相对湿度
| 地面风速 || WIND || m /s ||近地面（风速仪高度）风速
| 地表入射太阳辐射|| FSDS || W /m2 || 地表入射太阳辐射
| 降水率||PRECTmms||mm/hr || 降水率
更多信息，请参见随数据一同发布的数据文档。

background: Soil moisture plays an important role in land-atmosphere interactions. It is an important geophysical parameter in research on climate, hydrology, agriculture, and forestry. Soil moisture has important climatic effects by influencing ground evapotranspiration, runoff, surface reflectivity, surface emissivity, surface sensible heat, and latent heat flux. At the global scale, the extent of its influence on the atmosphere is second only to that of sea surface temperature. Soil moisture affects matter and energy balances between land and atmosphere through influencing moisture flux, sensible heat, and latent heat flux. Accurate estimates of the spatial and temporal distribution of soil moisture are of vital importance to further understanding the ecological and physical processes of land and land-atmosphere interactions, and are of great importance in the research and application of meteorology in environmental management, ecology, hydrology, and agriculture. Soil moisture information can currently be acquired with the following methods: regular and field observations, satellite remote sensing, and land hydrological modeling and simulation. However, soil moisture observations based on satellite remote sensing are also problematic. Precision of soil moisture inversion is related to soil type, ground surface roughness, and vegetation coverage. The uncertainty in these parameters results in inversion errors and insufficient temporal and spatial resolutions. Soil moisture obtained through land hydrological modeling simulation and calculation has good temporal frequency and spatial distribution. However, its precision is influenced greatly by model structure and input data. Data assimilation methods used currently in atmospheric, marine, and land data assimilation systems include mainly the optimal interpolation method, 3-D variation method, 4-D variation method, Kalman filter, and EnKF. EnKF is an assimilation method used widely in land model assimilation systems, and uses the Monte Carlo method (overall integration method) to calculate predicted error covariance of the state.

Yang et al. [6] developed an automatic rating system used to estimate moisture and energy balances of soil by assimilating AMSR-E vertical polarization 6.9 and 18.7 GHz luminance temperature data. Tian et al. [7–13], Zhang et al. [14, 15], and Jia et. al. [16] researched the improvement of land data assimilation methods and the rating of microwave luminance temperature assimilation observation operator models.

The land surface model is the core of the land data assimilation system. The CLM3.0 model is designed mainly for coupling with the atmospheric numerical model and provides the surface albedo (direct and scattered light within the visible and infrared bands), upward long-wave radiation, sensible heat flux, latent heat flux, water vapor flux, and east-to-west and south-to-north surface stress needed by the atmospheric model. One of the difficulties preventing us from improving the land model simulation precision is the lack of long-term, high-resolution, observational atmospheric driving data. The advanced microwave scanning radiometer (AMSR-E) carried by EOS/Aqua is the world's first sensor capable of providing soil moisture service outputs at the global scale.
research objective: This paper presents a China Land Soil Moisture Data Assimilation System (CLSMDAS) based on EnKF and land process models, and results of the application of this system in the China Land Soil Moisture Data Assimilation tests.

This paper explains the composition of the China Land Soil Moisture Data Assimilation System (CLSMDAS), processing methods and quality inspection of atmospheric driving data, the performance test of CLSMDAS with single-point observation data, error analysis of observed soil moisture data, and design, and analysis of the CLSMDAS method based on soil water model and station data.

In this paper, inverted precipitation and ground-incident solar radiation products acquired through high spatial and temporal resolution FY2C satellite data were introduced and combined with the NCEP reanalysis data to establish a set of high-quality atmospheric driving data which covers the Chinese region.
challenges: One of the difficulties preventing us from improving the land model simulation precision is the lack of long-term, high-resolution, observational atmospheric driving data. Due to insufficient available ground-level observation soil moisture data, the large error in observed soil moisture, and the inherent high variability of the spatial distribution of soil moisture, it is difficult to verify the assimilated soil moisture data.
methods: The CLSMDAS established in this paper was used to carry out a soil moisture data assimilation sensitivity experiment. We downloaded and processed AMSR-E daily output data between 2004 and 2007 and used regular nationwide soil moisture observation data, detailed soil moisture observation data from Inner Mongolia and Henan Province, and AMSR-E inverted soil moisture data for a comparative analysis. After CLSMDAS was established, first we used single-point observation data acquired from ecological stations for the land soil moisture data assimilation experiment and analyzed the performance of this assimilation system. In this paper, the ground-based observation data provided by newly-built climatic observation stations of China Meteorological Administration was used for a comparative verification of the FY2C ground-incident solar radiation data between July 2005 and June 2009.
dataset: FY2C/D/E satellite precipitation estimate outputs can be downloaded free of charge from the website of the China Satellite Data Service Center (http://satellite.cma.gov.cn/). The atmospheric driving data include: atmospheric temperature, relative humidity at 2 m altitude, wind speed, atmospheric pressure, and precipitation; surface short-wave radiation and 10 cm soil moisture data observed at ground level. The observation data were AMSR-E inverted soil moisture data downloaded from NASA’s official website (http://nsidc.org/data/amsre/).
findings: Both simulation and assimilation results of the land model reflected reasonably the temporal-spatial distribution of soil moisture. The assimilated soil moisture distribution matches very well with severe summer droughts in Chongqing and Sichuan Province in August 2006, the worst since the foundation of the People’s Republic of China in 1949. It also matches drought regions that occurred in eastern Hubei and southern Guangxi in September.

Analysis of the assimilation experiment between June and September 2006 shows that the CLSMDAS soil moisture distribution is consistent with soil moisture observed on the ground. The CLSMDAS soil moisture distribution on August 18, 2006 showed significantly lower soil moisture values in drought regions of Chongqing and Sichuan than in surrounding regions.
backgroundCn: 土壤湿度在陆地与大气相互作用中扮演着重要角色。它是气候、 hydrology、农业和林业研究中的一个重要地球物理参数。土壤湿度通过影响地面蒸散、径流、表面反射率、表面发射率、表面感热和潜热通量，对气候产生重要影响。在全球范围内，其对大气的影响程度仅次于海表温度。土壤湿度通过影响水分通量、感热和潜热通量，影响陆地与大气之间的物质和能量平衡。准确估计土壤湿度的时空分布对于进一步理解陆地及陆地与大气相互作用的生态和物理过程至关重要，并在气象、环境管理、生态学、水文学和农业的研究与应用中具有重要意义。目前，土壤湿度信息可以通过以下方法获取：常规和现场观测、卫星遥感以及陆地水文模型和模拟。然而，基于卫星遥感的土壤湿度观测也存在问题。土壤湿度反演的精度与土壤类型、地面表面粗糙度和植被覆盖度有关。这些参数的不确定性导致反演误差和时空分辨率不足。通过陆地水文模型模拟和计算获得的土壤湿度具有良好的时间频率和空间分布。然而，其精度受到模型结构和输入数据的很大影响。目前在大气、海洋和陆地数据同化系统中使用的数据同化方法主要包括最优插值法、3-D变分法、4-D变分法、卡尔曼滤波器和EnKF。EnKF是一种广泛应用于陆地模型同化系统的同化方法，利用蒙特卡罗方法（整体积分法）计算状态的预测误差协方差。
Yang等人[6]开发了一种自动评级系统，用于通过同化AMSR-E垂直极化6.9和18.7 GHz亮度温度数据来估计土壤的水分和能量平衡。Tian等人[7–13]、Zhang等人[14, 15]和Jia等人[16]研究了陆地数据同化方法的改进以及微波亮度温度同化观测算子模型的评级。

陆面模型是陆地数据同化系统的核心。CLM3.0模型主要设计用于与大气数值模型耦合，提供大气模型所需的表面反照率（可见光和红外波段的直接和散射光）、向上长波辐射、感热通量、潜热通量、水汽通量，以及东西向和南北向的表面应力。阻碍我们提高陆面模型模拟精度的一个困难是缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据。由EOS/Aqua携带的先进微波扫描辐射计（AMSR-E）是全球首个能够提供土壤湿度服务输出的传感器。
research objectiveCn: 本文介绍了一种基于集合卡尔曼滤波（EnKF）和陆地过程模型的中国土地土壤湿度数据同化系统（CLSMDAS），以及该系统在中国土地土壤湿度数据同化测试中的应用结果。
本文解释了中国土地土壤湿度数据同化系统（CLSMDAS）的组成、气象驱动数据的处理方法和质量检验、CLSMDAS与单点观测数据的性能测试、观测土壤湿度数据的误差分析，以及基于土壤水分模型和站点数据的CLSMDAS方法的设计与分析。
在本文中，通过高空间和时间分辨率的FY2C卫星数据引入了反演降水和地面入射太阳辐射产品，并结合NCEP再分析数据，建立了一套覆盖中国地区的高质量大气驱动数据。
challengesCn: 阻碍我们提高陆地模型模拟精度的一个困难是缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据。由于可用的地面观测土壤湿度数据不足、观测土壤湿度误差较大以及土壤湿度空间分布固有的高变异性，验证同化的土壤湿度数据变得困难。
methodsCn: 本文建立的CLSMDAS用于进行土壤湿度数据同化敏感性实验。我们下载并处理了2004年至2007年间的AMSR-E日输出数据，并使用了全国范围内的常规土壤湿度观测数据、内蒙古和河南省的详细土壤湿度观测数据以及AMSR-E反演的土壤湿度数据进行比较分析。在建立CLSMDAS后，首先使用从生态站获取的单点观测数据进行陆地土壤湿度数据同化实验，并分析了该同化系统的性能。本文使用中国气象局新建气候观测站提供的地面观测数据，对2005年7月至2009年6月的FY2C地面入射太阳辐射数据进行了比较验证。
datasetCn: FY2C/D/E卫星降水估计输出可以从中国卫星数据服务中心的网站（http://satellite.cma.gov.cn/）免费下载。大气驱动数据包括：2米高度的气温、相对湿度、风速、大气压力和降水；地面观测的短波辐射和10厘米土壤湿度数据。观测数据为从NASA官方网站（http://nsidc.org/data/amsre/）下载的AMSR-E反演土壤湿度数据。
findingsCn: 土地模型的模拟和同化结果合理地反映了土壤湿度的时空分布。同化后的土壤湿度分布与2006年8月重庆和四川省的严重夏季干旱非常吻合，这是自1949年中华人民共和国成立以来最严重的干旱。同时，它也与9月发生在湖北东部和广西南部的干旱区域相匹配。
2006年6月至9月的同化实验分析表明，CLSMDAS土壤湿度分布与地面观测的土壤湿度一致。2006年8月18日的CLSMDAS土壤湿度分布显示，重庆和四川的干旱地区土壤湿度值显著低于周边地区。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to improve the precision of soil moisture inversion when dealing with parameters like soil type and vegetation coverage?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于在处理土壤类型和植被覆盖等参数时提高土壤湿度反演的精度？
Example.AnswerEn: Soil moisture observations based on satellite remote sensing can be problematic due to precision issues related to soil type, ground surface roughness, and vegetation coverage. The uncertainty in these parameters results in inversion errors and insufficient temporal and spatial resolutions.
Example.AnswerCn: 基于卫星遥感的土壤湿度观测可能存在问题，主要由于土壤类型、地表粗糙度和植被覆盖度相关的精度问题。这些参数的不确定性导致反演误差以及时间和空间分辨率不足。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a challenge faced when attempting to verify assimilated soil moisture data using ground-level observations?
Example.QuestionCn: 在尝试使用地面观测数据验证同化土壤湿度数据时，面临的一个挑战是数据的空间和时间分辨率不匹配。
Example.AnswerEn: One of the difficulties in verifying assimilated soil moisture data is the lack of long-term, high-resolution, observational atmospheric driving data, coupled with insufficient ground-level observation soil moisture data and the large error in observed soil moisture, making it difficult to verify the assimilated data.
Example.AnswerCn: 验证同化土壤湿度数据的一个困难是缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据，加上地面观测土壤湿度数据不足以及观测土壤湿度的误差较大，使得验证同化数据变得困难。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a dataset that combines satellite data for the estimation of atmospheric driving factors such as precipitation and solar radiation over large regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 一个结合卫星数据以估算大区域内大气驱动因素（如降水和太阳辐射）的数据集的例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: Inverted precipitation and ground-incident solar radiation products acquired through high spatial and temporal resolution FY2C satellite data, combined with NCEP reanalysis data, were used to establish high-quality atmospheric driving data covering the Chinese region.
Example.AnswerCn: 通过高空间和时间分辨率的FY2C卫星数据获取的反演降水和地面入射太阳辐射产品，结合NCEP再分析数据，建立了覆盖中国地区的高质量大气驱动数据。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of atmospheric driving data derived from geostationary satellite and reanalysis data for the Chinese region?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 来自静止卫星和再分析数据的中国地区大气驱动数据的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: high spatial resolution of 0.1°×0.1°, temporal resolution of 1 hour, range of 75°-135°E in longitude, range of 15°-55°N in latitude, near-surface temperature, relative humidity, surface pressure, near-surface wind speed, surface incident solar radiation, precipitation rate
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 高空间分辨率为0.1°×0.1°，时间分辨率为1小时，范围为东经75°-135°，纬度范围为北纬15°-55°，近地表温度，相对湿度，地表气压，近地表风速，地表入射太阳辐射，降水率。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What techniques are used to improve the precision and resolution of soil moisture inversion from satellite remote sensing data?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 有哪些技术用于提高卫星遥感数据中土壤湿度反演的精度和分辨率？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: data assimilation methods, Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF), Monte Carlo method, predicted error covariance
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 数据同化方法，集合卡尔曼滤波（EnKF），蒙特卡罗方法，预测误差协方差

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What methods are used to integrate satellite data with ground observations for precipitation estimation in atmospheric datasets?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于将卫星数据与地面观测数据集成以估计大气降水的方法有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: six-hour cumulative precipitation estimates, high-resolution cloud classification information, one-hour cumulative precipitation estimates
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 六小时累计降水量估算，高分辨率云分类信息，一小时累计降水量估算。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution of a dataset created using geostationary satellites and reanalysis data for atmospheric driving data?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 使用静止卫星和再分析数据创建的气象驱动数据集的空间分辨率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How frequently is the atmospheric driving dataset updated in terms of time resolution?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 大气驱动数据集的更新时间分辨率是多频繁的？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the geographic coverage range of a dataset that includes atmospheric driving data for China?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 包含中国大气驱动数据的数据集的地理覆盖范围是什么？
Quantification.AnswerCn: 东经75°至东经135°，北纬15°至北纬55°。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of 'high-resolution observational atmospheric driving data' in meteorological research?
Definition.QuestionCn: “高分辨率观测大气驱动数据”在气象研究中的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: High-resolution observational atmospheric driving data are crucial for improving the precision of land model simulations. They provide detailed temporal and spatial information needed to accurately simulate land-atmosphere interactions, which are important for understanding ecological and physical processes and for applications in meteorology, environmental management, ecology, hydrology, and agriculture.
Definition.AnswerCn: 高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据对于提高陆地模型模拟的精确性至关重要。它们提供了详细的时间和空间信息，能够准确模拟陆气相互作用，这对于理解生态和物理过程，以及在气象、环境管理、生态学、水文学和农业等领域的应用都非常重要。

Definition.QuestionEn: How is 'soil moisture inversion' carried out using satellite remote sensing?
Definition.QuestionCn: 土壤湿度反演是如何通过卫星遥感进行的？
Definition.AnswerEn: Soil moisture inversion using satellite remote sensing involves the use of sensors like the AMSR-E, which captures luminance temperature data at different frequencies. The precision of this inversion is affected by factors such as soil type, surface roughness, and vegetation coverage. These satellite-based observations are combined with models to provide spatial and temporal estimates of soil moisture.
Definition.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度反演使用卫星遥感技术，涉及使用像AMSR-E这样的传感器，该传感器在不同频率下捕获亮度温度数据。这种反演的精度受到土壤类型、表面粗糙度和植被覆盖等因素的影响。这些基于卫星的观测结果与模型相结合，以提供土壤湿度的空间和时间估计。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do satellite remote sensing methods for soil moisture data collection compare to land hydrological modeling in terms of temporal and spatial resolution?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 卫星遥感方法与陆地水文模型在土壤湿度数据收集方面的时间分辨率和空间分辨率如何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Satellite remote sensing methods provide data influenced by soil type, surface roughness, and vegetation, which can result in inversion errors and insufficient temporal and spatial resolutions. In contrast, land hydrological modeling offers good temporal frequency and spatial distribution, though its accuracy is heavily dependent on model structure and input data.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感方法提供的数据受到土壤类型、地表粗糙度和植被的影响，这可能导致反演误差和时间、空间分辨率不足。相比之下，陆地水文模型提供良好的时间频率和空间分布，但其准确性在很大程度上依赖于模型结构和输入数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do atmospheric driving data derived from geostationary satellites differ from those obtained through conventional reanalysis data in terms of preparation and resolution?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 来自静止卫星的气象驱动数据与通过常规再分析数据获得的数据在准备和分辨率方面有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Atmospheric driving data from geostationary satellites, such as FY-2C, involve high-resolution cloud classification for temporal interpolation, offering 0.1°×0.1° spatial and 1-hour temporal resolutions. On the other hand, conventional reanalysis data, like NCEP, are downscaled from 1.0°×1.0° using spatial and temporal interpolation methods to achieve similar resolutions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 来自静止卫星（如FY-2C）的气象驱动数据涉及高分辨率的云分类以进行时间插值，提供0.1°×0.1°的空间分辨率和1小时的时间分辨率。另一方面，传统的再分析数据，如NCEP，通过空间和时间插值方法从1.0°×1.0°降尺度，以达到类似的分辨率。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences in the challenges faced by soil moisture data assimilation systems and satellite remote sensing in terms of data accuracy and verification?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 土壤湿度数据同化系统和卫星遥感在数据准确性和验证方面面临的挑战有哪些相似之处和不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both soil moisture data assimilation systems and satellite remote sensing face challenges related to data accuracy and verification. Assimilation systems struggle with the lack of long-term, high-resolution observational atmospheric data and verification difficulties due to spatial variability. Similarly, satellite remote sensing is limited by inversion errors due to variability in soil type, surface roughness, and vegetation coverage, affecting data precision.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度数据同化系统和卫星遥感在数据准确性和验证方面面临挑战。同化系统由于缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气数据以及由于空间变异性导致的验证困难而苦苦挣扎。同样，卫星遥感也受到反演误差的限制，这些误差源于土壤类型、地表粗糙度和植被覆盖的变异，影响了数据的精确性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can the development of high-resolution atmospheric driving data influence land-atmosphere interaction research?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 高分辨率大气驱动数据的发展可以通过以下几种方式影响陆气相互作用研究：
Interpretation.AnswerEn: High-resolution atmospheric driving data can enhance the simulation precision of land models by providing detailed inputs such as temperature, humidity, and solar radiation. This can lead to better understanding and modeling of land-atmosphere interactions, as demonstrated by the use of FY-2C satellite data combined with NCEP reanalysis for research in China.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 高分辨率的气象驱动数据可以通过提供温度、湿度和太阳辐射等详细输入，增强陆地模型的模拟精度。这可以更好地理解和模拟陆气相互作用，正如在中国研究中使用FY-2C卫星数据与NCEP再分析相结合所示。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the primary causes of errors in soil moisture inversion when using satellite remote sensing, and how do these factors affect the accuracy of data collection?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用卫星遥感进行土壤湿度反演时，主要的误差原因有哪些，这些因素如何影响数据收集的准确性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The primary causes of errors in soil moisture inversion using satellite remote sensing include soil type, ground surface roughness, and vegetation coverage. These factors influence the precision of soil moisture inversion by introducing uncertainties in the data, leading to inversion errors and insufficient temporal and spatial resolutions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度反演中主要的误差原因包括土壤类型、地表粗糙度和植被覆盖。这些因素通过引入数据的不确定性，影响土壤湿度反演的精度，导致反演误差以及时间和空间分辨率不足。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it challenging to improve the precision of land model simulations without long-term, high-resolution observational atmospheric driving data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在没有长期、高分辨率观测大气驱动数据的情况下，提高陆地模型模拟的精度是具有挑战性的。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Improving the precision of land model simulations is challenging due to the lack of long-term, high-resolution observational atmospheric driving data. This absence hinders the ability to accurately simulate land-atmosphere interactions and influences the performance of land models by limiting the quality and accuracy of the input data necessary for precise modeling.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 提高土地模型模拟精度的挑战在于缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据。这一缺失阻碍了准确模拟陆地-大气相互作用的能力，并通过限制精确建模所需输入数据的质量和准确性，影响了土地模型的性能。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the difficulty in verifying assimilated soil moisture data, particularly in regions with high variability in the spatial distribution of soil moisture?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在土壤湿度高度变异的地区，验证同化土壤湿度数据的困难因素包括以下几点：
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The difficulty in verifying assimilated soil moisture data arises from the insufficient available ground-level observation data, large errors in observed soil moisture, and the inherent high variability of the spatial distribution of soil moisture. These factors collectively complicate the verification process by reducing the reliability and representativeness of the data used for comparison.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 验证同化土壤湿度数据的困难源于可用地面观测数据不足、观测土壤湿度的误差较大以及土壤湿度空间分布的固有高变异性。这些因素共同使得验证过程复杂化，降低了用于比较的数据的可靠性和代表性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What is the impact on the temporal and spatial resolution of soil moisture data when using satellite remote sensing data versus ground-based observations?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用卫星遥感数据与地面观测相比，对土壤湿度数据的时间分辨率和空间分辨率的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Soil moisture observations based on satellite remote sensing are problematic due to precision issues related to soil type, ground surface roughness, and vegetation coverage, resulting in inversion errors and insufficient temporal and spatial resolutions. In contrast, soil moisture obtained through land hydrological modeling simulation has good temporal frequency and spatial distribution, but its precision is greatly influenced by model structure and input data.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 基于卫星遥感的土壤湿度观测存在问题，主要由于土壤类型、地表粗糙度和植被覆盖度相关的精度问题，导致反演误差和时间、空间分辨率不足。相比之下，通过陆地水文模型模拟获得的土壤湿度具有良好的时间频率和空间分布，但其精度受到模型结构和输入数据的很大影响。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the integration of high-resolution FY2C satellite data with NCEP reanalysis data influence the quality of atmospheric driving data in soil moisture studies?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 高分辨率FY2C卫星数据与NCEP再分析数据的集成如何影响土壤湿度研究中大气驱动数据的质量？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The integration of inverted precipitation and ground-incident solar radiation products acquired through high spatial and temporal resolution FY2C satellite data with NCEP reanalysis data was used to establish a set of high-quality atmospheric driving data covering the Chinese region. This integration aims to address the challenge of lacking long-term, high-resolution, observational atmospheric driving data.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 通过高空间和时间分辨率的FY2C卫星数据，结合NCEP再分析数据，整合了反向降水和地面入射太阳辐射产品，以建立覆盖中国地区的一套高质量大气驱动数据。这一整合旨在解决缺乏长期、高分辨率观测大气驱动数据的问题。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of using different data assimilation methods like the Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) for soil moisture data assimilation on the accuracy of soil moisture distribution predictions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用不同的数据同化方法，如集合卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF）对土壤湿度数据进行同化，会对土壤湿度分布预测的准确性产生什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of the Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) as an assimilation method in land model assimilation systems helps calculate predicted error covariance of the state, which can improve the precision of soil moisture distribution predictions. The assimilated soil moisture distribution has been shown to match well with observed soil moisture, reflecting reasonably the temporal-spatial distribution and aligning with actual drought conditions in certain regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 集成卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF）作为陆地模型同化系统中的同化方法，有助于计算状态的预测误差协方差，从而提高土壤湿度分布预测的精度。已证明，同化后的土壤湿度分布与观测到的土壤湿度匹配良好，合理反映了时空分布，并与某些地区的实际干旱条件相一致。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are employed to integrate satellite-derived precipitation estimates with ground observation data to improve spatial distribution accuracy in atmospheric datasets?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了提高大气数据集中空间分布的准确性，采用了哪些方法将卫星衍生的降水估计与地面观测数据进行整合？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The integration involves using multi-channel data from geostationary satellites to estimate 6-hour accumulated precipitation and merging these estimates with conventional ground observation data. High-resolution cloud classification information is then used to determine interpolation weights for converting 6-hour accumulated precipitation into 1-hour estimates.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该集成涉及使用来自静止卫星的多通道数据来估计6小时累计降水量，并将这些估计与常规地面观测数据合并。然后，利用高分辨率的云分类信息来确定插值权重，以将6小时累计降水量转换为1小时估计值。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in the downscaling of NCEP reanalysis data to achieve high temporal and spatial resolution atmospheric driving datasets for regional applications?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 下调NCEP再分析数据以获得高时间和空间分辨率的区域应用大气驱动数据集涉及哪些程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The downscaling process involves applying spatial and temporal interpolation methods to the original 1.0°×1.0° NCEP reanalysis data. This interpolation results in atmospheric driving datasets with a higher resolution of 0.1°×0.1° and an hourly temporal resolution, which includes variables such as near-surface temperature, relative humidity, surface pressure, and wind speed.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 下采样过程涉及对原始的1.0°×1.0° NCEP再分析数据应用空间和时间插值方法。该插值结果生成了具有更高分辨率的0.1°×0.1°和每小时时间分辨率的大气驱动数据集，其中包括近地面温度、相对湿度、地面气压和风速等变量。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data collection techniques enable the generation of high-resolution atmospheric driving datasets over China?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据收集技术能够生成中国的高分辨率大气驱动数据集？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The generation of high-resolution atmospheric driving datasets over China is enabled by the integration of geostationary satellite data, such as the Chinese Fengyun-2 series, with reanalysis data. For instance, precipitation data is derived by merging 6-hour cumulative precipitation estimates from the satellite with ground observations and applying high-resolution cloud classification for temporal interpolation. Solar radiation data is calculated using the DISORT radiative transfer model based on FY-2C satellite data.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过将静止卫星数据（如中国的风云-2系列）与再分析数据相结合，能够生成中国地区的高分辨率大气驱动数据集。例如，降水数据是通过将卫星的6小时累计降水估计值与地面观测数据合并，并应用高分辨率云分类进行时间插值而得出的。太阳辐射数据则是基于FY-2C卫星数据，使用DISORT辐射传输模型进行计算的。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do advancements in satellite remote sensing enhance the accuracy and spatial resolution of atmospheric driving data?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 卫星遥感技术的进步如何提高大气驱动数据的准确性和空间分辨率？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Advancements in satellite remote sensing, such as the use of high spatial and temporal resolution data from the FY-2C geostationary satellite, enhance the accuracy and spatial resolution of atmospheric driving data by providing detailed cloud classification information and radiative transfer calculations. This allows for precise determination of solar radiation and precipitation rates at a fine spatial resolution of 0.1°×0.1° and temporal resolution of 1 hour.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感的进展，例如使用FY-2C静止卫星的高空间和时间分辨率数据，通过提供详细的云分类信息和辐射传输计算，增强了大气驱动数据的准确性和空间分辨率。这使得能够以0.1°×0.1°的精细空间分辨率和1小时的时间分辨率精确确定太阳辐射和降水率。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the precision of soil moisture inversion from satellite remote sensing be problematic, and what factors contribute to this issue?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 从卫星遥感反演土壤湿度的精度可能存在问题，原因是什么？有哪些因素导致了这个问题？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The precision of soil moisture inversion from satellite remote sensing can be problematic due to factors such as soil type, ground surface roughness, and vegetation coverage. The uncertainty in these parameters results in inversion errors and insufficient temporal and spatial resolutions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 来自卫星遥感的土壤湿度反演的精度可能会受到土壤类型、地表粗糙度和植被覆盖等因素的影响。这些参数的不确定性导致反演误差以及时间和空间分辨率不足。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges are faced in improving the precision of land model simulations, particularly in relation to atmospheric driving data?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在提高土地模型模拟精度方面，特别是在与大气驱动数据相关的方面，面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: One of the main challenges in improving the precision of land model simulations is the lack of long-term, high-resolution observational atmospheric driving data. This insufficiency affects the ability to accurately simulate land processes and interactions with the atmosphere.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 提高陆地模型模拟精度的主要挑战之一是缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据。这一不足影响了准确模拟陆地过程及其与大气相互作用的能力。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it difficult to verify assimilated soil moisture data, and what issues are associated with ground-level observation soil moisture data?
Expectation.QuestionCn:
验证同化土壤湿度数据的困难主要在于以下几个方面：首先，土壤湿度的空间和时间变化非常复杂，受多种因素影响，如气候、土壤类型和植被覆盖等。其次，遥感技术虽然可以提供大范围的土壤湿度信息，但其分辨率和精度可能受到限制，难以与地面观测数据直接对比。

与地面观测土壤湿度数据相关的问题包括：地面观测点的分布不均，可能无法代表大范围区域的土壤湿度状况；观测设备的精度和校准问题；以及观测时间的局限性，可能无法捕捉到土壤湿度的瞬时变化。这些因素都使得验证同化土壤湿度数据变得更加复杂。
Expectation.AnswerEn: It is difficult to verify assimilated soil moisture data due to the insufficient availability of ground-level observation soil moisture data and the large errors in observed soil moisture. Additionally, the high spatial variability of soil moisture also contributes to the verification challenges.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于地面观测土壤湿度数据的可用性不足以及观测土壤湿度的较大误差，验证同化的土壤湿度数据变得困难。此外，土壤湿度的高空间变异性也增加了验证的挑战。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in using satellite remote sensing for soil moisture data collection, especially in terms of precision and resolution?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 使用卫星遥感进行土壤湿度数据收集的潜在挑战，特别是在精度和分辨率方面，主要包括以下几点：
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Satellite remote sensing for soil moisture data collection faces challenges related to precision due to factors like soil type, surface roughness, and vegetation coverage. These parameters can introduce inversion errors, while the resolution might be insufficient to capture detailed spatial and temporal variations, impacting the reliability of the data for ecological and hydrological research.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感在土壤湿度数据收集方面面临着由于土壤类型、表面粗糙度和植被覆盖等因素引起的精度挑战。这些参数可能会引入反演误差，而分辨率可能不足以捕捉详细的空间和时间变化，从而影响数据在生态和水文研究中的可靠性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm not sure why the lack of long-term, high-resolution observational atmospheric driving data is such a big challenge in this area.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白为什么缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据在这个领域是如此大的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The lack of long-term, high-resolution observational atmospheric driving data poses a significant challenge because it limits the ability to accurately simulate and model land-atmosphere interactions. High-resolution data are essential for understanding fine-scale atmospheric processes and for improving the precision of land model simulations, which are crucial for various environmental and agricultural applications.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据构成了一个重大挑战，因为这限制了准确模拟和建模陆地-大气相互作用的能力。高分辨率数据对于理解细尺度的大气过程至关重要，并且对于提高陆地模型模拟的精确性也至关重要，这对各种环境和农业应用都是关键的。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the data fusion process used to estimate precipitation rates by combining satellite data and ground-based observations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 数据融合过程用于通过结合卫星数据和地面观测来估计降水率。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The precipitation rate estimation involves using 6-hour accumulated precipitation estimates derived from China's Fengyun-2 (FY-2) geostationary satellite multi-channel data and fusing them with conventional ground-based observations. This fusion process produces spatial distribution data of 6-hour accumulated precipitation. High-resolution cloud classification information from the satellite data is then used to determine the temporal interpolation weights, resulting in 1-hour accumulated precipitation estimates.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 降水率估计涉及使用来自中国风云-2（FY-2）静止卫星多通道数据的6小时累积降水估计，并将其与传统的地面观测数据融合。这个融合过程产生了6小时累积降水的空间分布数据。然后，利用卫星数据中的高分辨率云分类信息来确定时间插值权重，从而得出1小时累积降水估计。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explain the challenges in improving soil moisture data precision and how data assimilation methods address these challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请解释提高土壤湿度数据精度的挑战，以及数据同化方法如何应对这些挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in improving soil moisture data precision include the lack of long-term, high-resolution observational atmospheric driving data, the large error in observed soil moisture, and the high variability in soil moisture's spatial distribution. Data assimilation methods like the Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) are employed to address these challenges by integrating satellite data with ground-based observations and model simulations to enhance the accuracy and consistency of soil moisture datasets.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 提高土壤湿度数据精度的挑战包括缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据、观测土壤湿度的误差较大以及土壤湿度空间分布的高度变异性。数据同化方法如集成卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF）被用来应对这些挑战，通过将卫星数据与地面观测和模型模拟相结合，以提高土壤湿度数据集的准确性和一致性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the methods and datasets used for generating high-resolution atmospheric driving data for land model simulations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述用于生成土地模型模拟的高分辨率大气驱动数据的方法和数据集。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The generation of high-resolution atmospheric driving data involves using FY2C satellite data to obtain inverted precipitation and ground-incident solar radiation products with high spatial and temporal resolution. These products are combined with NCEP reanalysis data to create quality atmospheric driving data for China. The data include variables such as atmospheric temperature, relative humidity, wind speed, atmospheric pressure, and precipitation, as well as surface short-wave radiation and soil moisture data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 高分辨率大气驱动数据的生成涉及使用FY2C卫星数据获取高空间和时间分辨率的降水和地面入射太阳辐射产品。这些产品与NCEP再分析数据相结合，以创建中国的高质量大气驱动数据。数据包括大气温度、相对湿度、风速、大气压力和降水等变量，以及表面短波辐射和土壤湿度数据。
